alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 1:01PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HANCOCK COUNTY THROUGH 130 PM CDT... At 101 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pearlington, or 8 miles west of Waveland, moving east-northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln, Shoreline Park, and Pearlington. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 2 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
